DOC.brief_summary: (A retrospective case control study to validate the association between Interleukin-1 gene variations and adult chronic periodontal disease in European Caucasians)
DOC.brief_title: Genetics of Periodontal Diseases in European Caucasians
DOC.criteria: Ethnicity: Dutch or German Caucasian None (however, diabetics were excluded during original patient recruitment at several clinical sites).
